title: Integrated Terrestrial Fluxes Model for Flood Forecasting [Version 0.5] (ITF-flood v0.5)
author: Luo, Xiangyu
abstract: This version of the ITF-flood model is intended for large-scale and high-resolution simulations for catchment-wide floods induced by widespread intense rainfall. Surface-water flows over hillslopes and inundated areas, and in river channels are represented in a two-dimensional manner.
subject: Process-based model
Flood
